_comment: User and device have their own sampling parameters.
To sample the relative pose of the user and the device, we keep the user fixed and move the device. This is consistent with the donning and doffing of a device.
If the parameter 'seed' is not 'null', then the seed of the internal random sampler will be set to that value
Path is the directory where the scene parameters are found.
If null, the Kiruna default is used.
Path is the directory where the user sampling file is found.
If null, the Kiruna default is used.
This is for perturbations internal to the device, such as those in the device's occluder, if one is present.
In the future, camera and LED perturbations will be dealt with here as well.
Here we have perturbations for the device as a single object.
This parameter is responsible for changes in eye relief.
Mid cornea has the default eye relief, and the far cornea apex has +7 eye relief
Near cornea apex with UPLC has -4 relief, and near cornea apex without UPLC has -8 eye relief
